broadwick.odesolver

Interface Ode


  • public interface Ode
    Interface defining a First Order Ordinary Differential Equation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Double> computeDerivatives(double t, List<Double> y)
      Get the current time derivative of the state vector.
      List<Double> getInitialValues()
      Get the initial values of each dependent variable.

    • Method Detail

      • computeDerivatives

        List<Double> computeDerivatives(double t,
                                List<Double> y)
        Get the current time derivative of the state vector.
        Parameters:
        t - current value of the independent time variable.
        y - array[list] containing the current value of the state vector.
        Returns:
        the derivative of the dependent variables.

      • getInitialValues

        List<Double> getInitialValues()
        Get the initial values of each dependent variable.
        Returns:
        double[] the (list of) initial values of each dependent variable
